title: What is the purpose of a containerization technology like Docker?
options: To manage the state of an application and ensure that it is always running
To store data in a structured format that can be easily queried and analyzed
To encrypt and decrypt data between the client and server
To package an application and its dependencies into a single image that can be run on any server that has Docker installed

title: What is the difference between horizontal scaling and vertical scaling in modern backend development?
options: Horizontal scaling adds more servers to a cluster to handle more traffic, while vertical scaling increases the capacity of an individual server
Vertical scaling adds more servers to a cluster to handle more traffic, while horizontal scaling increases the capacity of an individual server
Horizontal scaling and vertical scaling are the same thing
Horizontal scaling and vertical scaling both refer to adding more servers to a cluster to handle more traffic

title: What is the difference between an include and a require statement in PHP?
options: An include and a require statement are the same thing
An include and a require statement both produce a fatal error and stop executing the script if the file is not found
An include statement will produce a warning and continue executing the script if the file is not found, while a require statement will produce a fatal error and stop executing the script
A require statement will produce a warning and continue executing the script if the file is not found, while an include statement will produce a fatal error and stop executing the script

title: What is a prepared statement in PHP?
options: A way to optimize SQL queries for better performance
A way to prevent SQL injection attacks in a database
A way to group related SQL queries together
A way to create temporary tables in a database

title: What is the difference between an abstract class and an interface in PHP?
options: An abstract class can have concrete methods, while an interface has method declarations
An interface can have concrete methods, while an abstract class can only have abstract methods
An abstract class and an interface are the same thing
An abstract class and an interface can both have concrete methods
